Summary: small sphere-star like object white in color then turning a greenish color over time then back to white
divs: Sighting Detailsi was at work (i work on the surface part of an underground coal mine) standing at my bosses truck. talking with him and the dozer man.when i was looking at the darking sky to see what stars i can see at the time. when form a north-east direction a small medium sized orb like object. came moving slowly over are location. it was silent no noise at all. the object changed colors form white to green. moved kind of eratic at times. object dissipered after about 5 min. over the horizon.i thought it was an airplane until it started changing colors and no sound what so ever. i was kind of shocked for i havent seen anything i couldnt explain since i was a kid and saw another orb like object that just vanished into thin air.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Seth
This sighting has never been favorited.
